title: paripAhi mAm
sahitya:
paripAhi mAm nrharE murArE


anupallavi

  sarasija bhavanuta sAdhu lOka bhayApaha


caraNam 1    sharaNAgatAdi haraNa dEvadEvasha sutamanyu nata 
caraNa vara tApasa hrdayavArijAtagaLa hamsa
    caraNam 2    tanuja nikara damana dhanyakayA dhUtanaya sankaTa 
shamana janita bhuvana bhIti kanaka kashipuka kAla
    caraNam 3    shamala shalabha dIpa bhakta vIkSaNa shamita nistula 
kOpa kamala daLa nayana kamalanAbha satatam
